Gaussian Processes¶

The main classes

class pydygp.gaussianprocesses.GaussianProcess(kernel, kpar=None)[source]¶
fit(x, y=None, kpar=None, store_inv_cov=False)[source]¶

Computes and stores the covariance matrix at input points x

hyperpar_mh_update(y, kpar_cur, kpar_proposal, kpar_prior, lpcur=None, store_new_par=False, store_inv_cov=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Performs a single Metropolis-Hastings update of the process hyper-parameters

hyperpar_optim(y, p0=None, jitter=False)[source]¶

Performs the maximum likelihood estimate of the kernel hyperparameters

loglikelihood(y, x=None, kpar=None, return_cov=False, jitter=False)[source]¶

Returns the Gaussian process log-likelihood for a finite sample

pred(xnew, return_covar=False)[source]¶

Carries out prediction on a fitted Gaussian process.

sim(x=None, kpar=None)[source]¶

Simulates the Gaussian process at the inputs x.
